data.text:
Large rain drops were incessantly falling, striking the window. 
According to the morning weather forecast, it was supposed to 
clear up in the afternoon, though…
data.processed:
<story>Large rain drops were incessantly falling, striking the window. 
<story>According to the morning weather forecast, it was supposed to 
<story>clear up in the afternoon, though…

data.text: Pardon me~~~~!!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Pardon me~~~~!!!

data.text:
Trainer-san, Howdy~! 
Today's a training day but, the rain is really coming down!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, Howdy~! 
<story>Today's a training day but, the rain is really coming down!

data.text: So… I have a request!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>So… I have a request!

data.text:
Don't tell me that, in the middle of this downpour, she wants to 
run. She'd probably catch a cold-
data.processed:
<story>Don't tell me that, in the middle of this downpour, she wants to 
<story>run. She'd probably catch a cold-

data.text: Let's make a teru teru bozu!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Let's make a teru teru bozu!!

data.text:
Just now, everyone in class was talking about it. 
Saying [I really wanted to run outside, though].
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Just now, everyone in class was talking about it. 
<story>Saying [I really wanted to run outside, though].

data.text:
They were really really downhearted. 
Even the classroom seems kind of gloomy.
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>They were really really downhearted. 
<story>Even the classroom seems kind of gloomy.

data.text:
So then, I had an idea. I wanna make a Teru teru bozu! 
Not just any one, but a super big teru teru bozu!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>So then, I had an idea. I wanna make a Teru teru bozu! 
<story>Not just any one, but a super big teru teru bozu!!

data.text:
If it's super big, then it's power will be just as big! 
Even a hurricane would clear up in an instant!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>If it's super big, then it's power will be just as big! 
<story>Even a hurricane would clear up in an instant!

data.text:
So that's why, Trainer-san! 
Please let me have that curtain!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

choices.text: Making it out of a curtain?!
Making it out of a curtain?!

data.processed:
<story>So that's why, Trainer-san! 
<story>Please let me have that curtain!

data.text:
That's right! Leave it to me! 
With a powerful teru teru bozu, it'll definitely clear up!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>That's right! Leave it to me! 
<story>With a powerful teru teru bozu, it'll definitely clear up!

data.text:
And with that, everyone will show me their happy smiles. 
Alright, let's get started!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>And with that, everyone will show me their happy smiles. 
<story>Alright, let's get started!

data.text:
It's hard to refuse Taiki Shuttle's feelings when she's 
thinking about her friends. But, at this rate the 
curtains will become a teru teru bozu…!
data.processed:
<story>It's hard to refuse Taiki Shuttle's feelings when she's 
<story>thinking about her friends. But, at this rate the 
<story>curtains will become a teru teru bozu…!

data.text: Wha… what?! A bigger one…?!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Wha… what?! A bigger one…?!

data.text:
I went to the infirmary and grabbed a few unused bedsheets. 
I sewed them together into one larger piece.
data.processed:
<story>I went to the infirmary and grabbed a few unused bedsheets. 
<story>I sewed them together into one larger piece.

data.text: And then-
data.processed: <story>And then-

data.text:
Alright, now we just need to hang it by the window. 
Trainer-san, cheer up!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Alright, now we just need to hang it by the window. 
<story>Trainer-san, cheer up!

data.text:
Fuuu~. Hanging a big teru teru bozu 
by the window is bone breaking work.
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Fuuu~. Hanging a big teru teru bozu 
<story>by the window is bone breaking work.

data.text:
But, it's a wonderful big bozu! 
And the main point is this cute smile it has!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>But, it's a wonderful big bozu! 
<story>And the main point is this cute smile it has!

data.text:
A human-sized teru teru bozu was hanging by the window. 
…it was more like a room in a haunted house.
data.processed:
<story>A human-sized teru teru bozu was hanging by the window. 
<story>…it was more like a room in a haunted house.

data.text:
Yahooooo!! Okay! 
Now all those rain clouds will-…Oh?!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Yahooooo!! Okay! 
<story>Now all those rain clouds will-…Oh?!

data.text: Trainer-san, it's the sun!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san, it's the sun!!

data.text:
When I looked outside the window at the sky, at some point the 
rain had stopped and the sun was out between a gap in the clouds.
data.processed:
<story>When I looked outside the window at the sky, at some point the 
<story>rain had stopped and the sun was out between a gap in the clouds.

data.text:
Amazing! Leave it to a real life magic item! 
And, Trainer-san and my power!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Amazing! Leave it to a real life magic item! 
<story>And, Trainer-san and my power!

data.text:
Taiki Shuttle was excitedly gazing outside. 
…I won't tell her about the weather report.
data.processed:
<story>Taiki Shuttle was excitedly gazing outside. 
<story>…I won't tell her about the weather report.

data.text:
It's completely become a beautiful day for training! 
If it's like this, I can run using my full power!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>It's completely become a beautiful day for training! 
<story>If it's like this, I can run using my full power!

data.text: Yeeees! I'm gonna go see everyone's smiles!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Yeeees! I'm gonna go see everyone's smiles!

data.text:
With a loud voice that could reach out, 
a lively Taiki Shuttle ran off…
data.processed:
<story>With a loud voice that could reach out, 
<story>a lively Taiki Shuttle ran off…
